content.question: An uncharged parallel plate capacitor with plate area <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>A</mi></math> and plate separation <math alttext="d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>d</mi></math> is given charge <math alttext="positive Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mo>+</mo><mi>Q</mi></mstyle></math>. Which of the following equations correctly describes the potential difference <math alttext="delta V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi></mstyle></math> between the plates?

choices.label: <math alttext="delta V equals the fraction Q over epsilon sub 0, end sub, times d, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>Q</mi><mrow><msub><mi>ε</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>d</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta V equals the fraction epsilon sub 0, end sub, times A, over d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>ε</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow><mi>d</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta V equals the fraction Q d over epsilon sub 0, end sub, times A, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>Q</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mi>ε</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta V equals the fraction epsilon sub 0, end sub, times A, over Q d, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>ε</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>Q</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="delta V equals the fraction Q d over epsilon sub 0, end sub, times A, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>Q</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mi>ε</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
